**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 182 1.1 **Price** 200 gp **Usage** held in 2 hands --- This set of 34 parchment cards usually comes in a velvet bag or simple leather wrap. Each card depicts a different creature, monster, or other being that, when the deck is activated, immediately appears as a believable, life-size illusion. You can look at the card's artwork, but no magical effect takes place until you Activate the deck, shuffling and drawing randomly. Deck Of Illusions Cards You can use playing cards or Tarot cards as proxies for the cards in a deck of illusions.
